47T.F.long_name: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited
47T.F.summary: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited provides commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking Business, Securities Business, and Asset Management Business segments. The company accepts deposit products, such as current accounts, savings accounts, fixed deposit accounts, and certificates of deposit, as well as cards and bill payment services. It also provides personal loans, such as home loan, new and used car loans, and loans against inheritance pension; and corporate loans, including project and long term loans, short term loans, and guarantee products. In addition, the company offers investment services, including stock and derivative brokerage, mutual funds, private funds, and provident funds, as well as super savings fund /retirement mutual funds; and insurance services, such as life, retirement, health and critical illness, personal accident, car, and home insurance. Further, it provides investment banking services that financial advisory and underwriting for merger and acquisition, privatization advisory and implementation, project financing, debt restructuring, feasibility study, project valuation, general advisory, etc.; and private banking, and wealth and asset management services. Additionally, the company offers mobile banking, custodian, assets for sale, car auction, hire purchase, and SME lending services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated through a network of 347 branches under the Somwang brand. TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

47TA.F.long_name: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited
47TA.F.summary: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited provides commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Thailand. BAY-R.BK.long_name: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited
BAY-R.BK.summary: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides a range of banking services to individuals, corporates, small and medium-sized businesses, and financial institutions. The company's Retail segment provides a range of banking and related financial services, such as current and savings accounts, fixed deposits, bill of exchange, housing loans, credit cards, personal loans and sale finance loans, hire-purchase and leasing, wealth management, and bancassurance products. Its Commercial segment offers financial services and products, including credit facilities from short term working capital, cash management, trade finance, transactional banking, advisory services, and treasury and money markets products. The company also engages in the provision of refinancing, car rental, personnel, collection, mutual fund, private fund management, asset management, factoring and information technology, life and general insurance brokerage, micro-finance, venture capital, real estate lease, and other financial services, as well as in securities business. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 670 branches in Thailand; 1 branch in Vientiane; and 1 representative office in Myanmar, as well as 6,500 ATMs. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of MUFG Bank, Ltd.

BAY.BK.long_name: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited
BAY.BK.summary: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides a range of banking services to individuals, corporates, small and medium-sized businesses, and financial institutions. The company's Retail segment provides a range of banking and related financial services, such as current and savings accounts, fixed deposits, bill of exchange, housing loans, credit cards, personal loans and sale finance loans, hire-purchase and leasing, wealth management, and bancassurance products. Its Commercial segment offers financial services and products, including credit facilities from short term working capital, cash management, trade finance, transactional banking, advisory services, and treasury and money markets products. The company also engages in the provision of refinancing, car rental, personnel, collection, mutual fund, private fund management, asset management, factoring and information technology, life and general insurance brokerage, micro-finance, venture capital, real estate lease, and other financial services, as well as in securities business. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 670 branches in Thailand; 1 branch in Vientiane; and 1 representative office in Myanmar, as well as 6,500 ATMs. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of MUFG Bank, Ltd.

BBL-R.BK.summary: Bangkok Bank Public Company Limited provides various commercial banking products and services primarily in Thailand. The company operates through Domestic Banking, International Banking, Investment Banking, and Others segments. It offers various personal banking products and services, including savings, current, fixed deposit, foreign currency, and other accounts; home, personal, and other loans; mutual funds; investments products and services, such as bonds and debentures, as well as securities brokerage services; life and non-life bancassurance products; payment, funds transfer, currency exchange, and SMS services; debit, credit, purchasing, and prepaid cards; and phone and Internet banking, mobile banking, ATMs, and other services. The company also provides business banking products and services comprising operating accounts; loans for SMEs, international trade, investment banking, and e-guarantee services; securities services, such as custodian, mutual fund supervisor, provident fund registrar, securities registrar, and debenture holders' representative services; business loans, payroll, and online banking services; corporate financing services; and merchant and commercial cards. In addition, it offers trade finance, remittances, export and import, project, corporate finance, and advisory services, as well as liquidity, cash, fund, and asset management services. As of December 31,2020, the company operated through a network of 1,128 branches in Thailand; and approximately 300 branches in Cambodia, China, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Japan, Laos, Malaysia, Myanmar, the Philippines, Singapore, Taiwan, the United Kingdom, the United States, and Vietnam. Bangkok Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CIMBT-R.BK.short_name: CIMB THAI BANK PUBLIC COMPANY L
CIMBT-R.BK.long_name: CIMB Thai Bank Public Company Limited
CIMBT-R.BK.summary: CIMB Thai Bank Public Company Limited provides various banking and financial products and services to individuals and commercial customers in Thailand. It operates through Consumer Banking and Wholesale Banking segments. The Consumer Banking segment offers consumer sales and distribution, retail financial, and commercial banking and personal financing services. The Wholesale Banking segment provides investment banking services, such as financial advisory, trade securities transactions, and asset management businesses; and corporate lending and deposit taking, transaction banking, and treasury and market services. The company also offers savings, foreign currency, and current accounts, as well as fixed and Malaysia Ringgit deposits; personal and home loans, and multi-purpose loans; cards; and life and non-life insurance. In addition, it provides trade finance, cash management, money transfer, and digital and phone banking services; and hire purchase, leasing, and debt collection services. The company was formerly known as Bank Thai Public Company Limited and changed its name to CIMB Thai Bank Public Company Limited in May 2009. CIMB Thai Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. CIMB Thai Bank Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of CIMB Bank Berhad.

CIMBT.BK.short_name: CIMB THAI BANK PUBLIC COMPANY L
CIMBT.BK.long_name: CIMB Thai Bank Public Company Limited
CIMBT.BK.summary: CIMB Thai Bank Public Company Limited provides various banking and financial products and services to individuals and commercial customers in Thailand. It operates through Consumer Banking and Wholesale Banking segments. The Consumer Banking segment offers consumer sales and distribution, retail financial, and commercial banking and personal financing services. KBANK-R.BK.summary: Kasikornbank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides commercial banking products and services. The company's personal banking products and services include savings, current, fixed deposit, and foreign currency accounts; personal, home, and auto loans; debit and credit cards; life and non-life insurance products; investment products, such as mutual funds, stocks, and derivatives/futures exchange; money transfer and bill payment, cheque and draft, and foreign exchange services; mobile banking services; and digital banking. It also offers various products and services for small and medium enterprises, including savings, current, and fixed deposits; working capital, commercial, special, and business loans, as well as letters of guarantee; collection and payment services; life, non-life, and group insurance products; cards; and international trade services. In addition, the company provides various products and services for corporate customers, such as cash management solutions, including current, savings, special savings deposit, and fixed deposit accounts, as well as collection, payment, liquidity management, and electronic solutions; international trade solutions comprising import and export, global money transfer, guarantee, and trade finance solutions; working capital loans, term loans, special loans, and letters of guarantee; supply chain financing; life, non-life, and group insurance products; and foreign exchange and derivatives, corporate finance, securities, investment, and business card services. It operates 860 branches in Thailand and 6 internationally. Kasikornbank Public Company Limited was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KBANK.BK.summary: Kasikornbank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides commercial banking products and services. The company's personal banking products and services include savings, current, fixed deposit, and foreign currency accounts; personal, home, and auto loans; debit and credit cards; life and non-life insurance products; investment products, such as mutual funds, stocks, and derivatives/futures exchange; money transfer and bill payment, cheque and draft, and foreign exchange services; mobile banking services; and digital banking. It also offers various products and services for small and medium enterprises, including savings, current, and fixed deposits; working capital, commercial, special, and business loans, as well as letters of guarantee; collection and payment services; life, non-life, and group insurance products; cards; and international trade services. In addition, the company provides various products and services for corporate customers, such as cash management solutions, including current, savings, special savings deposit, and fixed deposit accounts, as well as collection, payment, liquidity management, and electronic solutions; international trade solutions comprising import and export, global money transfer, guarantee, and trade finance solutions; working capital loans, term loans, special loans, and letters of guarantee; supply chain financing; life, non-life, and group insurance products; and foreign exchange and derivatives, corporate finance, securities, investment, and business card services. It operates 860 branches in Thailand and 6 internationally. Kasikornbank Public Company Limited was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KGTFF.short_name: KRUNG THAI BANK PUBLIC CO LTD
KGTFF.long_name: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited
KGTFF.summary: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited provides various commercial banking products and services. The company operates through three segments: Retail Banking, Wholesale Banking, and Treasury and Investment. It provides various retail banking products and services, including current, savings, and fixed deposit accounts; time and foreign currency deposits; personal and housing loans; debit, travel, cash and top up, and credit cards; investment services; travel, motor, and home asset insurance products; money transfer, payment and top up, foreign exchange, and overseas education services; and e-banking services. The company also offers SME loans for small and medium businesses; and international business loans. In addition, it provides corporate banking products and services comprising cash management services, such as collection, liquidity management, and transfer and payment services; fixed deposit and current accounts; foreign currency and term deposits; cards; Fx, interest rate, equity, commodity, and credit derivatives; financial advisory services related to merger and acquisition transactions; financial advisory, underwriting, and selling agent services for products offered through the equity capital markets; project finance advisory and feasibility study services, as well as e-banking services; and investment solutions, such as government and corporate bonds, structured notes, and investment units. The company provides its services through a network of branches in Thailand and various centers internationally. Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KGTFY.short_name: KRUNG THAI BANK PUBLIC CO LTD
KGTFY.long_name: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited
KGTFY.summary: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited provides various commercial banking products and services. The company provides its services through a network of branches in Thailand and various centers internationally. Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KIFF.F.long_name: Kiatnakin Phatra Bank Public Company Limited
KIFF.F.summary: Kiatnakin Phatra Bank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services in Thailand. The company operates through Commercial Banking Business, Capital Market Business, and the Debt Restructuring segments. Its deposit products include current, savings, and fixed deposit accounts. The company also provides auto, home, and personal loans; and business loans, including construction machinery and materials, real estate, apartment and hotel, specialized industrial, and logistics loans. In addition, the company engages in the car auction, securities, real estate, investments, and fund management businesses. Further, it offers debit cards, digital and e-banking services, bancassurance products, and SME banking products, as well as foreign exchange and other services. As of December 31, 2020, the company had 64 branches. The company was formerly known as Kiatnakin Bank Public Company Limited and changed its name to Kiatnakin Phatra Bank Public Company Limited in August 2020. Kiatnakin Phatra Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KKP-R.BK.long_name: Kiatnakin Phatra Bank Public Company Limited
KKP-R.BK.summary: Kiatnakin Phatra Bank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services in Thailand. LHFG-R.BK.long_name: LH Financial Group Public Company Limited
LHFG-R.BK.summary: LH Financial Group Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in banking business in Thailand. The company operates in four segments: Investment Holding Business, Banking Business, Fund Management Business, and Other Businesses. It accepts deposit products, such as demand deposits, savings deposits, time deposits, and fixed deposit receipts; and offers loans, including housing, retail, and commercial loans, as well as overdrafts. The company also provides funds; securities brokerage, trading, and underwriting services; and investment advisory services. LH Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 2009 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

LHFG.BK.long_name: LH Financial Group Public Company Limited
LHFG.BK.summary: LH Financial Group Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in banking business in Thailand. The company operates in four segments: Investment Holding Business, Banking Business, Fund Management Business, and Other Businesses. It accepts deposit products, such as demand deposits, savings deposits, time deposits, and fixed deposit receipts; and offers loans, including housing, retail, and commercial loans, as well as overdrafts. The company also provides funds; securities brokerage, trading, and underwriting services; and investment advisory services. LH Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 2009 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVAU.F.long_name: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited
NVAU.F.summary: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, provides a range of banking services to individuals, corporates, small and medium-sized businesses, and financial institutions. The company's Retail segment provides a range of banking and related financial services, such as current and savings accounts, fixed deposits, bill of exchange, housing loans, credit cards, personal loans and sale finance loans, hire-purchase and leasing, wealth management, and bancassurance products. Its Commercial segment offers financial services and products, including credit facilities from short term working capital, cash management, trade finance, transactional banking, advisory services, and treasury and money markets products. The company also engages in the provision of refinancing, car rental, personnel, collection, mutual fund, private fund management, asset management, factoring and information technology, life and general insurance brokerage, micro-finance, venture capital, real estate lease, and other financial services, as well as in securities business. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 670 branches in Thailand; 1 branch in Vientiane; and 1 representative office in Myanmar, as well as 6,500 ATMs. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of MUFG Bank, Ltd.

NVPB.F.long_name: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited
NVPB.F.summary: Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited provides various commercial banking products and services. The company operates through three segments: Retail Banking, Wholesale Banking, and Treasury and Investment. It provides various retail banking products and services, including current, savings, and fixed deposit accounts; time and foreign currency deposits; personal and housing loans; debit, travel, cash and top up, and credit cards; investment services; travel, motor, and home asset insurance products; money transfer, payment and top up, foreign exchange, and overseas education services; and e-banking services. The company also offers SME loans for small and medium businesses; and international business loans. In addition, it provides corporate banking products and services comprising cash management services, such as collection, liquidity management, and transfer and payment services; fixed deposit and current accounts; foreign currency and term deposits; cards; Fx, interest rate, equity, commodity, and credit derivatives; financial advisory services related to merger and acquisition transactions; financial advisory, underwriting, and selling agent services for products offered through the equity capital markets; project finance advisory and feasibility study services, as well as e-banking services; and investment solutions, such as government and corporate bonds, structured notes, and investment units. The company provides its services through a network of branches in Thailand and various centers internationally. Krung Thai Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVPI.F.long_name: The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited
NVPI.F.summary: The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited provides various financial products and services. It operates in four segments: Corporate, SME, Retail, and Insurance. The company offers deposit products, such as savings, current, fixed deposit, long term deposit, foreign currency, and E passbook deposit accounts; home, car, personal, and mortgage loans; debit, prepaid, and credit cards; investment products comprising mutual funds, debentures, bonds, and other investments; accident, savings, health expense, income protection, heritage and life protection, travel, motor, property, unit linked, and other insurance products; and various payment services. It also provides credit facilities, such as overdrafts, promissory notes, clean bill discounts, long term loans, letter of guarantee, standby letter of credit, and acceptance/Aval; financial advisory and merger acquisition services; fixed income instrument and underwriting services; structured and project finance services; and foreign exchange and interest rate risk management services. In addition, the company offers business collection, business payments, and bank accounts and liquidity management solutions; corporate trust services, including custody, mutual fund supervisor, registrar, escrow agent, security agent, and debenture holder's representative services; international trade remittance, fund transfer, and foreign exchange services; business solutions; and digital banking services. It provides its products and services through its head office and branch network in Thailand; and through its branches in Singapore, Hong Kong, Laos, Vietnam, China, and the Cayman Islands, as well as through its subsidiaries in Thailand, Singapore, Cambodia, and Myanmar. The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NVPJ.F.summary: TMB Bank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides various commercial banking products and services to personal, small and medium sized enterprises, and corporate customers primarily in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking and Retail Banking segments. The company offers transactional, current accounts, savings, term deposits, multi-currency accounts, cash concentration and liquid accounts, and foreign currency deposits; supply chain solutions; personal and home loans, overdraft and construction loans, unsecured loans, letter of guarantee products, and working capital facilities; advisory services; loans for purchasing operating premises; and credit cards. It also provides mutual funds products; personal accident, life and health, motor, property, and travel insurance products; wealth banking products; mobile and Internet banking services; trade products and risk management by capital market products; payment, cash collection, and liquidity management services; custodian, fund supervisory, registrar and paying agent, fund accounting, and other agency services; debt capital market, loan arrangement and syndication, debt instrument, and merger and acquisition services, as well as property fund services for public offering; and digital banking, and bancassurance and business protection products. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TFBF.F.summary: Kasikornbank Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides commercial banking products and services. The company's personal banking products and services include savings, current, fixed deposit, and foreign currency accounts; personal, home, and auto loans; debit and credit cards; life and non-life insurance products; investment products, such as mutual funds, stocks, and derivatives/futures exchange; money transfer and bill payment, cheque and draft, and foreign exchange services; mobile banking services; and digital banking. It also offers various products and services for small and medium enterprises, including savings, current, and fixed deposits; working capital, commercial, special, and business loans, as well as letters of guarantee; collection and payment services; life, non-life, and group insurance products; cards; and international trade services. In addition, the company provides various products and services for corporate customers, such as cash management solutions, including current, savings, special savings deposit, and fixed deposit accounts, as well as collection, payment, liquidity management, and electronic solutions; international trade solutions comprising import and export, global money transfer, guarantee, and trade finance solutions; working capital loans, term loans, special loans, and letters of guarantee; supply chain financing; life, non-life, and group insurance products; and foreign exchange and derivatives, corporate finance, securities, investment, and business card services. It operates 860 branches in Thailand and 6 internationally. Kasikornbank Public Company Limited was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TISCO-R.BK.long_name: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited
TISCO-R.BK.summary: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited provides commercial banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Thailand. It operates through Commercial Banking Business, Securities Business, and Asset Management Business segments. The company accepts deposit products, such as current accounts, savings accounts, fixed deposit accounts, and certificates of deposit, as well as cards and bill payment services. It also provides personal loans, such as home loan, new and used car loans, and loans against inheritance pension; and corporate loans, including project and long term loans, short term loans, and guarantee products. In addition, the company offers investment services, including stock and derivative brokerage, mutual funds, private funds, and provident funds, as well as super savings fund /retirement mutual funds; and insurance services, such as life, retirement, health and critical illness, personal accident, car, and home insurance. Further, it provides investment banking services that financial advisory and underwriting for merger and acquisition, privatization advisory and implementation, project financing, debt restructuring, feasibility study, project valuation, general advisory, etc.; and private banking, and wealth and asset management services. Additionally, the company offers mobile banking, custodian, assets for sale, car auction, hire purchase, and SME lending services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated through a network of 347 branches under the Somwang brand. TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
